comment: Old and brittle but absolutely fantastic!

Professor Krolick did a great job of laying expectations out. He also has guest speakers that are very entertaining. Many were business executives. There are two projects but very manageable and he provides a detailed rubric. I enjoyed this class even though I did not know a lot about franchises to start.
Really great professor! Cares about students and does not overwhelm with work. This is a great course if you can fit it into your schedule. Best elective I took.
Really a great professor! Cares about students and does not overwhelm with work. Course is very manageable and was a great elective. Great to take if you can fit in schedule.
Great professor, definitely recommend taking this class.
Teaches in a relatable manner. Absolutely take him. My favorite class and professor at KSU so far.
10/10 Professor who truly cares and wants the best for you. I could easily say this has been my favorite professor all throughout my time at Kennesaw State.

He was an amazing professor overall! He provided several zoom sessions with great networks throughout the semester. We got to learn from his knowledge and knowledge from other experienced people in the franchise industry. He was easy to talk to and very hands on with everything he assigned. I loved this class & him as a professor! 10/10 experience!

One of the best professors I have taken at KSU. It was a small class that allowed him to get to know everyone on a personal basis. He has been extremely successful in business and with that has fantastic connections that he brought to class such as CEOs. I would take his class again in a heartbeat if possible. Textbooks are easy to read and cheap.
